section.name: AccessPlatform : What's New in 4.1
section.p: DataNucleus AccessPlatform version 4.1 extends the 4.0 capabilities with some internal refactoring. Below are some of the new features you can find in DataNucleus AccessPlatform 4.1.

ul.li: Minor upgrade to bytecode enhancement contract to allow for separation of enhancement API
Rewrite of handling of container field update code.
MongoDB : much improved relation handling, and support for date and interface fields.
RDBMS : support for some HikariCP connection pool properties
JPA : support for non-standard value generators
JPA : support for "KEY", "VALUE" keywords in JPQL
JPA : support for parameters in FROM "ON" clause of JPQL
Ability to save a query as a "named" query, for later access
Persistent Properties : you can now use inheritance in persistent properties
